function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Low coverage of domain knowledge and sparsity of properties in general-purpose KGs","Impact":"Difficulty in extracting COVID-19-relevant information and insights","Mitigation":"Developing specialized KGs for COVID-19 with comprehensive domain coverage","Technologies":"Semantic web standards and technologies, specialized KG linking tools","People":"Researchers, health professionals","Owner":"Research institutions, health organizations"},{"Description":"Majority of CORD-19 data set contains unstructured data","Impact":"Difficulty in extracting and analyzing specific COVID-19 information","Mitigation":"Implementing natural language processing (NLP) and text mining techniques","Technologies":"NLP tools, machine learning algorithms","People":"Data scientists, researchers","Owner":"Data science teams, research institutions"},{"Description":"More than 60% of included papers in CORD-19 do not mention COVID-19 related terms","Impact":"Reduced relevance of data for COVID-19 analysis","Mitigation":"Implementing advanced search and filtering algorithms","Technologies":"Text mining algorithms, keyword extraction tools","People":"Data scientists, researchers","Owner":"Data science teams, research institutions"}]}
